version_description:
Happy Holidays!!
- Seasonal Advent Calendar with daily rewards to unlock!
- General bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

All new Dumb Update!

- Four new characters to collect! Find Bonehead, Dippy, Ninny and Pillock and collect all their outfits!
- Over 20 new outfits to collect!
- New achievements with great rewards to earn!
- More bug fixes and performance improvements for you!

Huge update coming soon!

More bug fixes and performance improvements for you!

World Wide Launch!

- Bring the Beans into your world with AR! More Beans to come in future updates!
- Two new mini games! 
- Explore a space station in Shuttle shift!
- Prepare food for a super smoothie in Culinary Chaos!
- Four new Characters to discover!
- Over 20 new Cosmetic items to unlock!
- Lots of Dumb little fixes just for you!

World Wide Launch!

- Bring the Beans into your world with AR! More Beans to come in future updates!
- Two new mini games! 
- Explore a space station in Shuttle shift!
- Prepare food for a super smoothie in Culinary Chaos!
- Four new Characters to discover!
- Over 20 new Cosmetic items to unlock!
- Lots of Dumb little fixes just for you!

- A new mini-game!
- Surf down the sides of the pyramids in Dumbgypt, careful to avoid all the construction!
- Strange new Idols are showing up in pyramid run, I wonder what they do?
- Explore pyramid run for a chance to find the token rush entrance!
- Two new beans to discover in AR!
- Monday madness event now live! Play mini-games throughout the week to earn great prizes each Monday!
- Lots of new achievements to earn!

New AR Features!
A brand new mini game, Castle Catastrophe!
Trophy wall feature, can you collect them all?
New map and menu experience.
Lots of little bug fixes just for you.
More bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

- Paints for your Buildings! Paint your Towns in a variety of unique colors!
- Heaps of ornaments and statues! Decorate your Towns however you see fit!
- Earn Tokens and special gifts with the new Daily Bonus! Play each day for greater rewards!
- Revamped splash screen and a pretty new game icon!
- New and updated levels inside every Minigame!
- Token Rush Event! Every day a different Minigame is chosen!
- Claim up to 100 times as many Tokens with the new Jackpot screen!
- Take photos of your Towns with new Share functionality!
- Vast performance improvements and bug fixes across the board!

Brand New Dumb Update!

- All new mini-game! See how long you can last down Rafty Rapids!
- Cool new map to unlock, explore the new island of Dumbcove!
- Decorate your towns however you see fit!
- Vast performance improvements and bug fixes across the board!

Bug fix for issue with unlocking Dumbcove!
- Explore Dumbcove, don't forget there are heaps of ornaments and statues to unlock!
- See how long you can last down Rafty Rapids, be wary of your surroundings and avoid all dangers!

Brand New Dumb Update:
- Whole new DumbCastle Village to explore!
- Unlock and upgrade with new gems!
- Level up your favourites beans!
- More bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!
More bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

Main menu rework! Get to all your favourite mini games quicker!

NEW Classic Mode! Play all the mini games in a random order!

More bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!
More bug fixes and performance improvements just for you!

- Silly us, we were stuck in "Dumbcove" for too long... The interactive map is back!
- Return home to the original DumbWays 3 World Tour to re-visit and re-build your favourite towns!
- Enjoy all the favourite mini games and get yourself to the top.
- General bug fixes and performance improvements.
